title: Privacy Policy
overview: This document outlines how PopData Insights collects, uses, and protects personal and population-related data.

content.description: We collect personal information such as names, email addresses, and demographic details.
We collect and process population data from various public and proprietary sources.
Personal and population data is used to provide insights, services, and products.
Data may be shared with third-party partners for research and analysis purposes.
We implement security measures to protect personal and population data.
Users have the right to access, correct, or delete their personal information.
